Some Lesser Known Facts About Mohit Malhotra

Does Mohit Malhotra smoke?: No

Does Mohit Malhotra alcohol?: Yes

In 2009, Mohit Malhotra participated in the reality show ‘MTV Splitsvilla Season 2’ where he was ended up as the first runner-up.

In the same year, he got his first break in the TV serial ‘Mitwa Phool Kamal Ke’ as Birju.

He received huge fame in 2010 when he played the role of Sid in the TV serial ‘Sasural Genda Phool.’

In 2011, Mohit Malhotra participated in the dance show ‘Nachle Ve with Saroj Khan.’

He is a huge fan of the American business tycoon and politician, Donald Trump.

In 2013, Mohit hosted the dance reality TV show ‘India’s Dancing Superstar’ that was aired on Star Plus.

He has been featured in various TV commercials like Pepsi, Minute Maid, Royal Enfield, Convergys, Aircel, V-Mart, etc.

He is a die-hard party lover.

Mohit Malhotra is a fitness enthusiast and visits the gym regularly.
